record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 8:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 8:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - December 12, 2007)

[Page: S15378]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 9:39 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, December 13, 2007, at 8:30 a.m.
